sense.def:
Kadar mikroskop ali povečevalno steklo
magnifies an object
, tisti predmet naredi večjega, kot je v resnici.

seg.quote: The lenses magnified his eyes to the size of dinner plates.

sense.def:
To magnify something
pomeni tudi, da stvar naredimo pomembnejšo, kot je v resnici.

seg.quote: His fears have greatly magnified the true dangers.
